name: AVPlayerItemTrack
desc: An object that represents the presentation state of an asset track that the player presents.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player item presents the trackâ€™s media during playback.

items.name: var assetTrack: AVAssetTrack?
items.desc: The asset track for which the player item track represents its presentation state.

items.name: var currentVideoFrameRate: Float
items.desc: The current frame rate of the video track as it plays.

items.name: var videoFieldMode: String?
items.desc: A mode that specifies the handling of video frames that contain multiple fields.

items.name: let AVPlayerItemTrackVideoFieldModeDeinterlaceFields: String
items.desc: A video field mode that requests deinterlacing of video fields.
